articles.title: Scenes From America’s Largest Wildfire - The New York Times
articles.description: Small fires burned inside hollowed-out trees. Smoke rose from the blackened dirt. On the edge of the Bootleg Fire in southern Oregon, firefighters worked to halt the advance of the flames.
